snippet: A judge will rule Monday on the Mets’ legal fight against the trustee for the victims of Bernard L. Madoff. He can dismiss the case or let it go to trial.
abstract: Ruling by federal Judge Jed S Rakoff will determine the fate of the New York Mets’ owners in their protracted legal fight against the trustee for the victims of Bernard L Madoff; Rakoff can either dismiss the case or let it go to trial; meanwhile, data shows that ticket and concession revenue for the Mets plummeted in 2011.
lead_paragraph: A judge will rule Monday on the Mets’ legal fight against the trustee for the victims of Bernard L. Madoff. He can dismiss the case or let it go to trial.

headline.main: Mets Await a Key Ruling Amid More Negative News
